1.content: Okay, I'll start off by saying what makes me happiest the most. It would have to be meeting new people. I love it as there is so much to learn from different people and then you will make good friends and know such a diverse group of people. That and my family for all the support they've given me over the years. You only get one family so please cherishe every moment with them! Okay now that you have read what makes me really happy, why not add what makes you happy? That way we can spread happiness!
1.title: What  makes Ant happy!

11.content: It makes me happy when people I love are happy because of me. I love my friends and family and when I do things for them that helps them, I am overjoyed. I made a quilt for my little sister a week ago and she was thrilled! I am also happy when I do the right things that make my loved ones proud. What makes everyone else happy?
11.title: Cheslovski Star

choices: What makes you happy the most?
What makes you happy here in WDC?
111.content: What makes me happy really are those things that creates an impact on my me like my family, friends, brothers, sisters, writing, eating, cooking, learning, singing, watching movie, listening to music, etc...And you?
111.title: next person

1111.content: Too many things to list,but I really like writing.com.
1111.title: Writing.com

11111.content:
What makes me happy about my family is that we're all healthy and mostly get along well. That's my nuclear family. Another thing that makes me happy is how much my husband cares about me and our children.

I'm happy that I live in a place with clean water that I can drink without getting sick.

I am glad that I am free to speak my mind without persecution.

On Writing.com, constructive reviews make me happy. They don't have to be all nice and just say my stuff is super, but a friendly formulated critique goes a long way at making me a better writer.

What is the next person happy about?
11111.title: Next person

1111111.content: Coming home from work to find my family there, safe and sound. Being able to help them out and being useful to the family myself. Being able to escape from real life online and expressing myself here in ways I could never do out in the real world. Between Writing.com, Rachel's Haven, and D+X, I've really begun to express myself in ways I never could have dared before. Talking too late at night with friends from all over the world, finding out any information I want online within seconds. I'd be really happy if I could find a special someone to share some of this with, but you can't have it all.
1111111.title: Kara Elle

11111111.content:
me again.
I am happy that my wife is pregnant
11111111.title: Next person

1111111111.content:
What makes me happy is waking up in the morning and knowing that I'm a living person, unique in my own ways and similar in others. And sitting in a cozy house when there's a storm outside, or listening to my favorite songs, or being around my friends and people I love.
How about everyone else on this zany website?
1111111111.title: SilentOuroboros

11111111111.content: TiTs!!!!! yeah really big ones (i'm not always like this) But yeah massive tits!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
11111111111.title: A horny moment

111111111111.content: that my wife is exspecting a baby boy
111111111111.title: next

1111111111111.content:
Yo ZombieAlex here.

What makes me happy? Being me of course. I enjoy being unique and doing my own thing. Some people look down on me for being differnet but who cares. I love to dance to my favorite tunes even if its out in public. Who cares what people think of you? I don't! As long as I can be me then I'm happy. No need for fame fortune or even thjat many friends. I just want people who accept me like my family and my best friend Paul. Who cares if i'm branded as a outcast. Sucks to be you! You couldn't see past the warning lable. "Warning Differnet and enjoying it!"
1111111111111.title: Being me...

11111111111111.content: Many things make me happy but the thing that makes me the most happy is my grand daughter. Seeing her smiling face warms my heart like the sun on a cold winter's day. She is my greatest joy in life. What is your greatest joy?
11111111111111.title: Next person...

111111111111111.content: HEEY BABEEHHH WAT MAKE ME HAPPY IS SWAPPING BODEEEEEZ WITH SUM O DESSE RANDOM PEDESTRIAN WOMAN WALKING DOWN DE STREET THEN GOING INTO DE NEAREST MC DONALD BATROOM AND FINGERING MESELF IN THEM BODEE
111111111111111.title: Next person

1111111111111111.content:
...Oooookay... I have absolutely nothing to say about the last chapter except... why? I suppose I can't judge.

What makes me happy is a tie between to completely different things... I like fist fighting, and assisting others... I know... Odd combination. But hey it's what makes me happy.
1111111111111111.title: Total_Pokemon

11111111111111111.content: I appreciate that i live in a loving community that supports me every inch of the way.

...These are a few of my fav-or-ite-Things....

...JK; what makes me happy is watching some good ole Team Four Star on Youtube.
111111111111111111.title: The ColdBlooded King

1111111111112.content: What makes me happy is when my brother is happy
1111111111112.title: next

11111111111121.content: I love corgis, and eating food. I also like having people listen to my tummy while I eat more food. I love feeling full.
11111111111121.title: Next

choices: What makes you happy about your family?
What makes you happy about school? (Even if you hate it)
111111111112.content: What makes me happy is my family, music, my friends, very friendly people, funny people, YouTube, etc. But, the thing that makes me happiest is God. Without Him, I wouldn't be here right now. Actually, none of us would be here right now. And writing.com wouldn't be here right now. So, thank You, God for creating us all. I love You. :)
111111111112.title: next

choices: What makes you happy at work?
What is making you happy at this very moment?
1112.content:
Hm...what makes me happy in WDC?

Well, what do you think? Writing, you big silly! I joined the site because I love to write. Moreover, I love to write, and have my writing read. That's the point, isn't it?

If a tree falls in the woods and there is no one around, it still makes noise....but it's much more fun if someone hears the noise, and responds with more noise! Even if what I've written is complete and total bunk, and the reader hates it, and gives me a lousy review (and doesn't send any GP's), I still have the satisfaction of being read, and provoking some sort of emotional/psychological reaction in another person. (Even if this person turns away from the computer screen and vomits violently, and has horrific nightmares for days afterward....that's better than nothing.)
1112.title: What makes you happy here in WDC?

11122.content: HEEY BABEEHHH WAT MAKE ME HAPPY IS SWAPPING BODEEEEEZ WITH SUM O DESSE RANDOM PEDESTRIAN WOMAN WALKING DOWN DE STREET THEN GOING INTO DE NEAREST MC DONALD BATROOM AND FINGERING MESELF IN THEM BODEE
11122.title: What is making you happy at this very moment?

1113.content: what makes me happy is turning into a vampire by a vampire chick.
1113.title: What makes you really happy?

11131.content: What really makes me happy is ragtime piano from Scott Joplin. After I play his songs when I'm down, I feel way better. =)
11131.title: Ragtime

111311.content: One thing that makes me incredibly happy is going camping and fishing with my family. There is nothing quite as exhilarating to me as being outdoors enjoying nature all around me. My favorite campsite right now has a pair of nesting Bald Eagles. They are so beautiful I sit and watch them for hours. Also, has anyone else noticed how food always tastes so much better when you are outdoors? Even hotdogs and hamburgers taste great when they are cooked over a campfire.
111311.title: What makes you happy?

1113111.content: HEEY BABEEHHH WAT MAKE ME HAPPY IS SWAPPING BODEEEEEZ WITH SUM O DESSE RANDOM PEDESTRIAN WOMAN WALKING DOWN DE STREET THEN GOING INTO DE NEAREST MC DONALD BATROOM AND FINGERING MESELF IN THEM BODEE
1113111.title: What makes you happy?

11131111.content: I'm just happy when I see other people happy :)
11131111.title: what makes you happy?

info.brief_description: An interactive about what makes people happy. Add yours now!
info.description: This is a different interactive than what you've seen before. What it is is a place where yuu add what makes you happy the most and then leave an option so the next person can add what makes them happy and so on. It can be anything in the world! Lets spread the joy people!
